Reference

All functions

adaptive_breaks()

Generate a set of breaks that attempt to be evenly spaced while ensuring each interval has the specified minimum count

area_between_dhist_ecmfs()

Calculate area between two discrete histogram empirical cumulative mass functions (ECMFs)

area_between_offset_ecmfs()

Area between two offset Empirical Cumulative Mass Functions (ECMFs)

as_smoothed_dhist()

Set dhist smoothing

as_unsmoothed_dhist()

Remove dhist smoothing

binned_densities_adaptive()

INTERNAL FUNCTION - Do not call directly

cost_matrix()

Inter-bin cost matrix from bin centres

count_graphlets_ego()

Ego-network graphlet counts

count_graphlets_ego_scaled()

Scaled graphlet count for ego-networks

count_graphlets_for_graph()

Count total number of graphlets in a graph

count_graphlets_per_node()

Count graphlets for each node in a graph

count_orbits_per_node()

Count graphlet orbits for each node in a graph

counts_from_observations()

Count number of occurences

cross_comp_to_matrix()

Convert a pair-wise cross-comparison into a matrix format

cross_comparison_spec()

Generate a cross-comparison specification

dhist()

Discrete histogram constructor

dhist_ecmf()

Generate interpolating empirical cumulative mass function (ECMF) for a discrete histogram

dhist_from_obs()

Discrete histogram from observations

dhist_from_obs_slow()

Discrete histogram from observations (Pure R slow version)

dhist_mean_location()

Calculate mean location for a discrete histogram

dhist_std()

Calculate standard deviation of a discrete histogram

dhist_variance()

Calculate variance of a discrete histogram

ecmf_knots()

Get "knots" for discrete histogram empirical cumulative mass function (ECMF). The "knots" are the x-values at which the y-value of the ECDM changes gradient (i.e. the x-values between which the ECMF does its constant or linear interpolates)

emd()

Earth Mover's Distance (EMD)

emd_cs()

Earth Mover's Distance (EMD) using the difference of cumulative sums method

emd_fast_no_smoothing()

Compute Earth Mover's Distance (EMD) between two Empirical Cumulative Density Functions (ECDFs)

emd_lp()

Earth Mover's Distance (EMD) using linear programming (LP)

`==`(<dhist>)

Compare dhists

gdd()

Graphlet-based degree distributions (GDDs)

gdd_for_all_graphs()

Load all graphs in a directory and calculates their Graphlet-based Degree Distributions (GDDs)

graph_features_to_histograms()

Convert a matrix of node level features to a discrete histogram for each feature

graph_to_indexed_edges()

Integer index edge list from igraph

graphlet_ids_for_size()

Graphlet IDs for size

graphlet_key()

Graphlet key

harmonise_dhist_locations()

Harmonise a pair of discrete histograms to share a common set of locations

indexed_edges_to_graph()

Graph from integer index edge list

interval_index()

Bin values into intervals based on the provided breaks

is_dhist()

Check if an object is a dhist discrete histogram

is_numeric_vector_1d()

Check if 1D numeric vector

make_named_ego_graph()

Get ego-networks for a graph as a named list

mean_centre_dhist()

Centre a discrete histogram around its mean location

mean_density_binned_graphlet_counts()

INTERNAL FUNCTION - Do not call directly

min_emd()

Minimum Earth Mover's Distance (EMD)

min_emd_exhaustive()

Minimum Earth Mover's Distance (EMD) using exhaustive search

min_emd_optimise()

Minimum Earth Mover's Distance (EMD) using optimiser search

min_emd_optimise_fast()

Minimum Earth Mover's Distance (EMD) using fast optimiser search

net_emd()

NetEMD Network Earth Mover's Distance

net_emds_for_all_graphs()

NetEMDs between all graph pairs using provided Graphlet-based Degree Distributions

netdis()

Netdis

netdis_centred_graphlet_counts()

Generate Netdis centred graphlets counts by subtracting expected counts

INTERNAL FUNCTION - Do not call directly

netdis_expected_graphlet_counts_ego()

INTERNAL FUNCTION - Do not call directly

netdis_expected_graphlet_counts_ego_fn()

Generate Netdis expected graphlet count function

netdis_for_all_graphs()

Netdis between all graph pairs using provided Centred Graphlet Counts

normalise_dhist_mass()

Normalise a discrete histogram to unit mass

normalise_dhist_variance()

Normalise a discrete histogram to unit variance

orbit_key()

Orbit key

orbit_to_graphlet_counts()

Orbit to graphlet counts

read_simple_graph()

Read a graph from file, simplifying as requested

read_simple_graphs()

Read all graphs in a directory, simplifying as requested

shift_dhist()

Shift discrete histogram

shift_to_next_alignment()

Minimum shift to next alignment of two location vectors

simplify_graph()

Simplify an igraph

sort_dhist()

Sort discrete histogram

virusppi

Protein-protein interaction (PPI) networks for 5 microorganisms
